nodes.bodyText:
Why don't we rename this to DiagnosticsLog? I like simple names.
And then we have 2 classes:
DiagnosticsStdout
DiagnosticsLogFile

nodes.bodyText:
I would print the directory.
Diagnostics log directory is [....]

INFO: [192.168.1.5]:5701 [dev] [4.1-SNAPSHOT] Diagnostics log directory is [/Users/buraksezer/Projects/hazelcast]

Is that OK? I'm not sure about the square brackets.
That is good. With customer provides strings it is best to add something like [...] around it so it is easier for them to understand what they have configured.
